titles.title: To amend chapter 24 of title 38, United States Code, to provide for the establishment of at least one national cemetery in each State.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Memorial Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/28/1993--Introduced. Requires the Director of the National Cemetery System to establish at least one national cemetery in each State.
